name: TapTap Princess
description:
The devil Maou led his monster servants to erode the world.
As a princess, you stand up to protect the world
Recruit, upgrade soldiers, form a team to fight for you
Unlock gallery
Collect monster Dragonbones animations and
Six stylish Live 2D animations

Spend movement points
Tap or drag to summon your troops
Power up your soldiers and let them fight for you
and retrieve your kingdom!

Game Features
Static CG
Dynamic Interactive CG
Part of plots are voice acted
